task.title: Changing the current working copy
task.shortdesc: You can choose between previously used working copies or use the file browser to select a copy stored at a different location on your local drive.

stepsection.note: You can safely switch between working copies without changing project files and even if your current working copy contains unstaged changes.

step.cmd: Select a previously used working copy from the Working copy drop-down list or browse for a working copy on your local drive by completing the following actions:

substep.cmd: In the view, click the Browse File System icon.
In the Choose window, navigate to an existing local clone of a repository and click Choose.
If you are asked whether to store your SSH or HTTPS access credentials, answer the prompts appearing on the screen according to your preferences.
